mapper.update: update OPU_RS_MENU set MENU_DELETED = '1' where MENU_ID = #{id}
update OPU_RS_MENU set MENU_DELETED = '1' where MENU_SEQ like CONCAT(CONCAT('%.',#{id}),'.%')

update OPU_RS_MENU
MENU_ID = #{menuId},
MENU_CODE = #{menuCode},
MENU_NAME = #{menuName},
MENU_ICON_CSS = #{menuIconCss},
NET_TMN_ID = #{netTmnId},
APP_SOFT_ID = #{appSoftId},
FUNC_ID = #{funcId},
PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId},
MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel},
MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq},
MENU_SORT_NO = #{menuSortNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf},
SUB_COUNT = #{subCount},
ACTIVE_SUB_COUNT = #{activeSubCount},
PAGE_OPEN_MODE = #{pageOpenMode},
SMALL_IMG_PATH = #{smallImgPath},
MIDDLE_IMG_PATH = #{middleImgPath},
BIG_IMG_PATH = #{bigImgPath},
MENU_MEMO = #{menuMemo},

CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},

MENU_INVOKE_TYPE = #{menuInvokeType},
IS_SINGLE_URL = #{isSingleUrl},
AUTO_SWITCH = #{autoSwitch},
MENU_INNER_URL = #{menuInnerUrl},
MENU_GOV_URL = #{menuGovUrl},
MENU_OUTER_URL = #{menuOuterUrl},
MENU_TAG_URL = #{menuTagUrl},
IS_RECENTLY_ADD = #{isRecentlyAdd},
HUGE_IMG_PATH = #{hugeImgPath},

update OPU_RS_MENU set MENU_INVOKE_URL = #{url} where FUNC_ID = #{funcId}
mapper.select:
select
FROM OPU_RS_MENU menu where menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.MENU_ID = #{menuId}

select , appSoft.SOFT_NAME appName, func.FUNC_NAME funcName from OPU_RS_MENU menu left join opu_rs_app_soft appSoft on appSoft.APP_SOFT_ID = menu.APP_SOFT_ID left join opu_rs_func func on func.FUNC_ID = menu.FUNC_ID where menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.NET_TMN_ID = #{netTmnId} order by menu.MENU_SORT_NO ASC ,menu.CREATE_TIME ASC

SELECT
FROM OPU_RS_MENU menu WHERE MENU_DELETED = '0' AND NET_TMN_ID = #{netTmnId} AND MENU_SEQ NOT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%.',#{menuId}),'.%') ORDER BY MENU_SORT_NO ASC ,CREATE_TIME ASC

select MENU_ID as menuId from OPU_RS_MENU menu where MENU_DELETED = '0' and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and FUNC_ID in
#{funcId}

select MENU_ID as menuId from OPU_RS_MENU menu where MENU_DELETED = '0' and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId} and FUNC_ID in
#{funcId}

select
from OPU_RS_MENU menu where MENU_DELETED = '0' and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and MENU_ID in
#{menuId}
order by MENU_SORT_NO asc

select distinct
from OPU_RS_MENU menu, OPU_RS_ROLE_FUNC rolefunc where menu.FUNC_ID=rolefunc.FUNC_ID and menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.IS_ACTIVE = '1' and menu.NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId} and rolefunc.ROLE_ID in
#{roleId}
order by menu.MENU_SORT_NO asc

select
from OPU_RS_MENU menu where menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.MENU_CODE = #{menuCode}
select PARENT_MENU_ID as id, count(PARENT_MENU_ID) as subCount from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and PARENT_MENU_ID is not null and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId} group by PARENT_MENU_ID

select PARENT_MENU_ID as id ,count(PARENT_MENU_ID) as subCount from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and PARENT_MENU_ID is not null and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId} group by PARENT_MENU_ID
select count(*) from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId}
select count(*) from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and ( PARENT_MENU_ID is null OR PARENT_MENU_ID = '' ) and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId}

select
from OPU_RS_MENU menu where MENU_DELETED = '0' and ( PARENT_MENU_ID is null OR PARENT_MENU_ID = '' ) and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId} order by menu.MENU_SORT_NO asc ,menu.CREATE_TIME asc
select max(MENU_LEVEL) from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId}
select count(*) from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and PARENT_MENU_ID is null and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and NET_TMN_ID = #{tmnId}

select , tmn.TMN_NAME as tmnName, soft.SOFT_NAME as appName, func.FUNC_NAME as funcName from OPU_RS_MENU menu left join agx_rs_tmn tmn on tmn.TMN_ID = menu.NET_TMN_ID left join opu_rs_func func on func.FUNC_ID = menu.FUNC_ID left join opu_rs_app_soft soft on soft.APP_SOFT_ID = menu.APP_SOFT_ID from OPU_RS_MENU menu where menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.PARENT_MENU_ID = #{menuId}

select , tmn.TMN_NAME as tmnName, soft.SOFT_NAME as appName, func.FUNC_NAME as funcName from OPU_RS_MENU menu LEFT JOIN agx_rs_tmn tmn ON tmn.TMN_ID = menu.NET_TMN_ID LEFT JOIN opu_rs_func func ON func.FUNC_ID = menu.FUNC_ID LEFT JOIN opu_rs_app_soft soft ON soft.APP_SOFT_ID = menu.APP_SOFT_ID where menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' and menu.MENU_SEQ like CONCAT(CONCAT('%.',#{menuId}),'.%') and menu.MENU_ID != #{menuId} order by menu.MENU_SORT_NO ASC ,menu.CREATE_TIME ASC
select count(*) from OPU_RS_MENU where MENU_DELETED = '0' and MENU_SEQ like CONCAT(CONCAT('%.',#{menuId}),'.%') and MENU_ID != #{menuId}

SELECT
FROM OPU_RS_MENU menu WHERE menu.MENU_DELETED = '0' AND IS_ACTIVE = '1' AND PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId}

select
from OPU_RS_MENU menu where MENU_DELETED = '0' and IS_ACTIVE = '1' and MENU_LEVEL <= ${menuLevel} ORDER BY MENU_SORT_NO ASC
mapper.update: update OPU_RS_MENU set IS_LEAF = case IS_LEAF when '0' then '1' else '0' end where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
update OPU_RS_MENU set IS_SINGLE_URL = case IS_SINGLE_URL when '0' then '1' else '0' end where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
update OPU_RS_MENU set AUTO_SWITCH = case AUTO_SWITCH when '0' then '1' else '0' end where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
update OPU_RS_MENU set IS_RECENTLY_ADD = case IS_RECENTLY_ADD when '0' then '1' else '0' end where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
update OPU_RS_MENU set IS_IMG_ICON = case IS_IMG_ICON when '0' then '1' else '0' end where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT ru.USER_ID userId, ru.ORG_ID orgId, rm.MENU_INNER_URL menuInnerUrl FROM opu_ac_role_user ru, opu_rs_role_func rf, opu_rs_menu rm where rm.MENU_DELETED = '0' and ru.ROLE_ID = rf.ROLE_ID and rm.FUNC_ID = rf.FUNC_ID and ru.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY ru.USER_ID,ru.ORG_ID,rm.MENU_INNER_URL

SELECT ru.USER_ID userId, ru.ORG_ID orgId, rm.MENU_INNER_URL menuInnerUrl FROM opu_ac_role_user ru, opu_rs_role_func rf, opu_rs_menu rm where rm.MENU_DELETED = '0' and ru.ROLE_ID = rf.ROLE_ID and rm.FUNC_ID = rf.FUNC_ID GROUP BY ru.USER_ID,ru.ORG_ID,rm.MENU_INNER_URL
